title: Name the champion you cant play to save your life
body:
I used to think i couldnt play Azir and Yasuo but turns out all I needed was practice. Riven on the other hand.....would blind Boxbox and co. I seen videos, read about animation cancels amd such but its just not happening ._.'

This is coming from someone whose most played is Lee Sin and Nidalee, arguably some of the most mechanically demanding champs.

replies.body: {{champion:38}}  and {{champion:35}}
Nidalee mechanically demanding?
Insert jungler here
Any ADC.

{{champion:107}} No matter how hard I try I'm always executed by the jungle monsters on first clear, and when I jump in, my double q never seems to kill their carry. Instead I just die because I'm squish and they deal more damage than me ):

{{champion:119}} His kit is completely counter-intuitive to how I like to play, but I have only tried him a couple times.

 {{champion:58}}  I am honestly amazed anyone wins with this guy. Probably the most disappointing champion I have ever played. 

{{champion:29}}  I could probably play him good enough to save my life, but why would I want to?

{{champion:32}} I cannot get this guy to work for me. For someone whose like 3rd favorite champion is {{champion:33}}, with {{champion:421}} and {{champion:64}} in front of him, you'd think I'd play {{champion:32}}. But no, I just cannot make him work for me.

{{champion:59}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:101}} 

Have never been able to get the hang of them, but I'm a Top main, secondary being jungle, so.
*cough* Top {{champion:421}} crazy strong. *cough*

{{champion:18}} ...
I keep trying to insec people. Did not end well.
i remember when i first picked her up. i could not learn to rocket jump for my life.
as of now its seems like Leona{{champion:89}} .

Jarwan 4 


easy and simple combo that i just cant hit 

every game i quickly go behind
{{champion:110}} In general I am a miserable ADC because I like being either bursty or tanky with good mobility. I am not the best at positioning completely perfectly so yeahhhhhhhhh.

Any top laner. Ever. Doesn't matter who I play top. 99% chance we will lose the game. I am serious. I've tried tons of different champs, taken mid laners top, adc top, but every single time. I lose. It's not even funny.

{{champion:1}} 

For some reason something about her just does not click with me. One of the simplest champions in the game, and I am totally incapable of playing her.
Trying to learn {{champion:105}} jg. Everyone says he's easy to play but jesus christ i'm losing every game like wtf.
{{champion:150}} I end up transforming at the worst times no matter how carefully I manage my rage bar.
{{champion:134}} Sorry to anyone who's witnessed this...
{{champion:7}} {{champion:245}}

Rengar

Karma

Annie(From support)

{{champion:105}} 

I play (and main) some of the most difficult to master champions in mid lane: {{champion:134}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:103}}. but yet {{champion:105}} and arguably {{champion:238}} escape me.
Whenever I touch{{champion:412}} my team dies instantly
{{champion:64}} {{champion:61}}
